website_summaries.verdict: A larger hot dog roller that is capable of cooking up to 18 hot dogs at once.
pros: This stainless steel hot dog cooker features nonstick, slow-rotating rollers and offers a 1-year limited warranty
The dual temperature controls allow you to keep some hot dogs warm while cooking others
cons: Although this unit is highly rated, it tends to cost a little more than comparable models

customer_reviews.title: but to keep them at a nice, consistent temp
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a three day fundraiser. We had it turned on from 9:00 a.m - 9:00 pm three days in a row. I used regular hot dogs, and since we had a bit of extra time at the start, I used a setting of "2", which was sufficient to not only heat up the hot dogs, but to keep them at a nice, consistent temp. When I first used the machine, I had it higher, and the hot dogs "blistered" a little bit, which of course only hurt the visual appeal.... "2" on this machine is a perfect setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a lot smaller...
customer_reviews.text: ...But I love it! This is kind of what you'd find in a 7-Eleven store if you have one of those in your area. Just keeps rotating those dogs. They taste great! The three rows on the back have a separate control for fast cooking. It takes a while to get the hang of it. But I guess the major rule is to put them on there early and let them cook slowly, they taste better that way. CONS: The drip tray has very sharp edges, be careful when washing it. It can slice your fingers if you are not careful
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Same item, higher price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover because the 7 roller cover was listed as plastic. I am using it for a different application and didn't give much thought to how feasible that was if used correctly-- otherwise I would have realized that it was a misprint and actually glass. Had I thought it was glass I would have purchased this EXACT cover from Superior Popcorn for almost half the price. Hopefully this review and/or a call to amazon will have the material information corrected.
customer_reviews.author: wes heath

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to be loud? Still works well!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on its test run but it's loud. Is it supposed to have such a grinding noise while it's running? Nervous how long it will last but it cleaned very easy and did its job well. I'm excited and just hope the sound is okay! Looks super sturdy and just like the big commercial ones but they don't sound like this at the gas stations 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: AllianceMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting hotdogs
customer_reviews.text: This unit is easy to use. I would advise cleaning it when it is a little warm with vinegar and water in a spray bottle. The hotdogs I cooked were done in about 10 - 12 minutes and had a great flavor. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous2020

customer_reviews.title: Motor bearing cheaply made brass.
customer_reviews.text: Motor bearing is made of brass, causes bearing failure and motor failure. We use it for 8 hours a day. Lasted about 1 1/2 months. Not a commercial unit. Home occasional use would be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Huffine

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, I thought I purchased new
customer_reviews.text: Well, I received the roller and noticed that the product had been used. Wether it was used for testing or a refurbished product... Who knows. Not happy, I thought I purchased new.
customer_reviews.author: chris stewart

customer_reviews.title: Overall Awesome, hard to clean; sharp bottom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent outside of cleaning and the creases on the bottom that will slice your fingers wide open like a razor blade.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs and Kielbasa
customer_reviews.text: Awesome dog roller. This machine is great for party's. It's been used about 5 times now and is performing flawlessly. This really takes the effort out of preparing dogs for groups. As soon as a few are missing just toss on a few more you never run out. WARNING 4088 GNP Hotdog 7 Roller Cover DOES NOT FIT this machine.
customer_reviews.author: just some guy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Well we ordered first one almost 2 weeks before 4th of July party and it never showed up and then ordered second one and it doesn't work. We turned on and it made noise then it made circuit breaker go out in kitchen. I would be ok if they would just let us send back and give us new one but they said since over 30 days they won't send new one. I have never wrote a review let alone a bad one but we are very disappointed. Just thought everyone should know experience.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Arango

customer_reviews.title: Cooked about 300 hotdogs in those 2 days and worked great. Very pleased with performance so far
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my sons boyscout troop for a fundraising event. It ran 2 days straight for 10hrs each day. Cooked about 300 hotdogs in those 2 days and worked great. Very pleased with performance so far.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D. Andreuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Great hotdog heater
customer_reviews.text: Great hotdog heater! When I bought this my brothers told me that it would be a waste of money but the second I used it they immediately took back what they said. I've used this about 9 times so far (for hotdogs and sausages) and it's always been a hit at parties. I'm giving this 4 stars because it is a pain to clean and hard to transport.
customer_reviews.author: jmaximo93

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that they didn't at least offer to exchange it
customer_reviews.text: The holes to attach the cover to roller do not match. I ordered the correct cover so I don't know what the problem is. I bought this in May, for a family reunion in July. I did not try to attach the cover until day of reunion. Due to it being over the companies 30 day return policy they would not take it back. I was disappointed that they didn't at least offer to exchange it. I now have a useless cover.
customer_reviews.author: naomi dautremont

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 6 weeks and it stopped working. Back rollers don’t rotate. Heating element is intermittent. This is a cheap piece of equipment. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lidza Kalifa

customer_reviews.title: Quality Hotdog Cooker with Hood
customer_reviews.text: A quality appliance. Works great, very pleased with our purchase. The hood also well made and fits great, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Great Northern Commercial Quality Hot Dog Roller (Model # 4094) ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Great Northern Commercial Quality Hot Dog Roller (Model # 4094) as a more convenient alternative to propane gas grilling, I'm most pleased with quality, price, and ease of ordering. The only negatives relate to Operators Manual. Under How to Use, item 2, Note is inaccurate for this model; FRONT dial does not control all rollers, it controls only the front 6, while BACK controls the rear 5. Also, disappointed manual does not include a parts list. Otherwise, looking forward to using the machine for the first time in mid-January .
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRichard Harris Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Perfect for parties.
customer_reviews.text: I just made 96 hot dogs in 1 hour today. Perfect temperature inside and not burned outside. Rollers are easier to clean when they are cooled down but still spinning. Be generous with paper towels. Get a mixture of wet and dry towels to clean the rollers. I was able to put 3 hot dogs on each roller. 24 hot dogs in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for basketball league. When boiling hot dogs in a crock pt they dogs just did not taste good. This cooker makes a huge difference in taste and I am told clean up is easy. The warm up feature is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Luckie

customer_reviews.title: Happy, but...
customer_reviews.text: I got it used for $14, so great value. But at the normal price, no.
customer_reviews.author: Ringo5000

customer_reviews.title: this thing is not fragile!
customer_reviews.text: great hot dog roller I've used it for a few months now. it is easy to clean and the kids love the hot dogs. the shipping was also very quick.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Quick Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love the hotdog roller. It cooks the hotdogs so quickly. It is difficult to clean, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: David Milan

customer_reviews.title: It works great and is the best value when it comes to ...
customer_reviews.text: What a bang for the buck. I bought this for my company to use at a car show. We cooked over 200 hot dogs without a lick problems. We now use it once a week to cook hot dogs for customers and employees. It works great and is the best value when it comes to hot dog rollers.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: When purchasing this is said that this item was frequently ...
customer_reviews.text: When purchasing this is said that this item was frequently matched/bought with a certain hot dog roller but it was the wrong one. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product when i read the less than perfect reviews, but took a leap of faith and purchased it anyway. I recieved the roller in a very timely manner and was able to use this for concessions at my childrens hockey tournament. We had no problems at all and several people complimented how good the hot dogs tasted. Once we got the right heat level it was a big success. I highly recommend this to anyone in search of a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Duran

customer_reviews.title: not what was shown on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: the one I ordered had Stainless Steel sides. The one I got has Clear sides. Just found out when checking the box that I had put up (since I didn't needed it when I got the Grill). Lesson Check what's in it even if you don't need it right away.
customer_reviews.author: RRT-TX

customer_reviews.title: This hot dog roller is great. Our family loves the ballpark style hot dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: This hot dog roller is great. Our family loves the ballpark style hot dogs cooked on it. It does have a large footprint on the counter but I place a tile burner cover on it when not in use so I can use it for storage till we need it. It has two settings so you can cook on it and then keep the dogs warm. Good purchase for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Getalonglittledoxies

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a zero I would. First time out of the box, when turned it on there was a grinding noise. Rollers rolled but hotdogs constantly sliding to one side. Sent back and not reordered.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Williams

customer_reviews.title: They love 7-11 1/4 lbs hotdogs so I got this so ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my parents a hot dog roller and cover for a Christmas gag gift. They love 7-11 1/4 lbs hotdogs so I got this so they could do roller hot dogs at home. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: MuddyPuppy

customer_reviews.title: love it...
customer_reviews.text: Bought in 2016, Used multiple times at parties and get togethers. Always worked as expected. Easy cleaning while still hot with water and handful of paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Limpy99

customer_reviews.title: Eww!
customer_reviews.text: Ewww! We also got a machine that was obviously used! It is ridiculous that something like this got sent out!
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA KORBAL

customer_reviews.title: I love it but after only using it a couple times the back rollers are not turning.
customer_reviews.text: I Really like the roller but I have only used it 4 times and now the back rollers stopped rotating. They heat but wont turn. I have contacted the company for help but have not heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice now; once at home to test it and it was great, the second time was yesterday at a family reunion and everyone loved it. It will be used again next Sunday for a second family reunion and has already been "reserved" by a friend for her upcoming family reunion.
customer_reviews.author: CSD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hot dog roller for our concession stand. The very first time we turned it on the back 4 rollers did not work. I should have listened to the reviews and not purchased this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liesa Pennington

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk.
customer_reviews.text: Used this in a convenience store to fix hotdogs. Used it about 35 days and it quit working. The rollers won’t turn. The warranty was only good for 30 days. The motor blew up. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Hartman’s Gas

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out the box
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work out of the box contacted amazon about it they said would have to go through manufacturer... they tried to contact them they didn’t get a response... stuck with a broke never used cooker
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in a commercial capacity. We have had no issues with it and it works wonderfully. We would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pavlik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I only used this once (Super Bowl party), but it worked great. Clean up was pretty easy. All my guests were super impressed that we actually had a real hot dog machine. Dogs cooked quickly and then kept nice and warm. This was a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: noisy. irregular cooking. hot dog may burn on right but under cook on left side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is outstanding. Works great and a high quality product. I recommend this to anyone looking for a great product of this nature. I am extremely pleased with my machine....joe
customer_reviews.author: joemish

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this cover and the screws to attach it ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cover and the screws to attach it to the machine are in the wrong place on the machine or the brackets were wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jamo

customer_reviews.title: Like some of the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviews, I received mine and the packaging looks fine but once opening, it had dents in it. I figured since its for home use, no biggy, after waiting 25 min and the rollers rolling the hot dogs, I went to check and sure enough the heating elements was not working. A replacement is on its way, I will update this review when I receive the new one and as long as it works, I will update the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money and it comes in very handy for kids patries
customer_reviews.author: Frank D

customer_reviews.title: NO INSTRUCTIONS!! HELP!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received this item. It was neatly packed and not broken upon opening it. The item was heavy glass, which I expected it to be plastic. The unfortunate part of this was it had 0/ none / absolutely no assembly instructions. the item was different than all the pictures of the productg so I couldnt use that as help. It was a total guessing game. I think I might have put it together properly but it appears that you have to drill holes in your hot dog cooker to attach it?? the item in the picture appears to have metal sides. the item I reveived has glass sides. it's nice but definately need instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SHANE

customer_reviews.title: great deal at go prices
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is what you need if you have a lot of family get to gathers . It works great and everyone can get when they Are ready and note all at onces
customer_reviews.author: Gismo

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: Gets constantly used in the break room. Has high miles but keeps on going.
customer_reviews.author: Snowy owl origomi and doctor who is alpha John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every one who has seen it loved it, many of them bought one for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawks39

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any party!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great unit! Everyone at the party always loves the rolled dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Buy it...you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: OMG we love it! You will never want hot dogs any other way.
customer_reviews.author: Shar (Choo) Iseri

customer_reviews.title: I just love hot dogs..
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing unit as I can never guess how many i want...this takes care if that...easy clean up,looks awesome and nice weight to it...definitely worth it. .
customer_reviews.author: james a johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great easy cleanup. No more standing at a hot grill. Hotdogs did not dry out like on a grill.👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This roller grillis easy to clean and heats quickly just the bill for the the church kids. Wish it had the sneeze guard included without paying an extra 24 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a fundraiser it works out fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Dennis C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Heats fast
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Love it. Heats fast. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Mm mm Good!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my husband for Christmas, he loves it! We felt like we were at a carnival! Easy to clean, works better than we expected, can't wait for the Super Bowl to show off.
customer_reviews.author: PDG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for price . Bests buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice and fit great. Was real easy to put on. And works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Gismo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality control on this product is very poor! The unit I received did not work the first time I turned it on out of the shipping box. The rollers did not turn, because the chain drive was bound up. If the unit had been checked before it was shipped, they wound has seen that the rollers were not turning.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Northern cover fo 7 roller commercial grade hot dog rolller
customer_reviews.text: expected this product to be plastic or plexiglass, but was really surprised that is was actually made of glass, and heavy glass at that. Assembly is easy and instructions are good. It makes clean up much easier by being glass.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for all the parties. Such a hit with all the kids
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  B

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and cooked 6 hours straight on them two days in a row for an even we had. Cooked 1700 hot dogs. No complaints other than the rollers were a bit tough to clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Idahoan

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy way to cook hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a pool party, got a lot of comments, easier that cooking dogs on the grill and everybody was able to serve them selves.
customer_reviews.author: A. Strauss

customer_reviews.title: love it...great buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT... will order 3 more this week
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great roller!
customer_reviews.text: Great roller! Something about a hot dog cooked in a roller So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Used this product for about a week loud gear noise ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for about a week loud gear noise from the start, THEN there was a short in the wiring and a large spark and a hole in the bottom of the metal ended the use of the product. PLEASE if you get this be Very careful!
customer_reviews.author: Jaryd

customer_reviews.title: Hotdog cooker
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this and have used it several times and it was the best buy
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding... Quality, Ease, and Delicious Hot Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a birthday party - used it for the Super Bowl as well - it's simple, easy to use and clean, of top quality, and it's a hot dog roller! Just plain fun to have around. You can cook up hot dogs, brats, sausages, or whatever - and the adjustable heat settings let you do so in anywhere from 3-4 minutes to 3-4 hours - quite versatile. A lot folks asked, "so did you rent that somewhere" and of course the answer was "no, got it on Amazon for under a hundred bucks" - and now it's the primary way I plan to cook hot dogs - delicious. The Pigeon would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brews1314

customer_reviews.title: Great dog roller!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Heat settings differ in temp if both on same level is the only Minor issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super!!!! Very happy with it and was shipped very fast !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 7 Roller Hot Dog Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Bought two 7 roller units with covers. One unit cooks much faster that the second. Investigating with the company as to the cause. Units much safer than previous boiling method for hot dog preparation. Will cook 12 hot dogs in less than 15 minutes. Clean-up is a little tedious. If both units heated the same, I would give this 4 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Biagio E. Cannistraci

customer_reviews.title: WeinerTron 2000
customer_reviews.text: We have SO many pool parties in the summer just for our family and friends plus, our son's sports teams, etc. This is absolutely perfect! People go crazy when they see it in a home setting and it cooks the franks perfectly! My 15 year old had a sleepover with 12 of his buddies the other day and it was awesome to keep hot dogs ready to go for a bunch of hungry boys throughout the evening. I also boiled some Brats and placed them on the grill and it worked perfectly! The wheels are a little hard to clean, but the drip tray underneath comes out easily and that is a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, we trippled our fundraising amount by selling ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, we trippled our fundraising amount by selling hot dogs at our tournament. Easy to clean and cooks Frank's very well.
customer_reviews.author: SLT

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy with the product-- it pops every GFI in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with the product-- it pops every GFI in the house. Now I have to contact an electrician to help us.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pereira

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these. First one's roller quit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. First one's roller quit working in 4 months, so brought another not having time to call/ or get fixed.. The second one i bought last month and roller is already making noise.
customer_reviews.author: Mitesh Bhalavat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and extremely satisfied but the drip tray has sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Everyone at the party enjoyed the taste of the hot dogs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for parties. Have only used it once since it arrived at the end of March. Everyone at the party enjoyed the taste of the hot dogs. There is nothing like a roller dog. The group probably ate more than they wanted to but they couldn't pass up the taste. Will and have recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Northen commercial quality 18 hot dog and 7 roller grill
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Originally was going to buy the cheaper smaller more toy like hotdog cooker, but after reading reviews decided on the larger commercial grill. It is a little large for a family of 2, but what the heck, it does a great job and you can always have friends over for hotdogs. You can cook them and them keep them warm until eaten instead of twenty cold hotdogs on a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Harold R. Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the glass, but did not come with hardware to put together. Waiting for shipment of hardware
customer_reviews.author: Tari Hedstrom

customer_reviews.title: Never Met A Weiner It Didn't Like
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our church get togethers. WONDERFUL little durable machine.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it at home 2 to 3 times a week . To clean I turn it on high and use cold water and it cleans it fast .
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use. Keeps food at a good temperature and is super easy to rotate and put more hot dogs or sausage on so everyone stays happy. Great product !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JasonC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little roller to use for parties. And fulfilled a lifelong dream of having my own roller grill
customer_reviews.author: max klassen

customer_reviews.title: HOT DOG!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. Dogs cooked perfectly. My two sons borrowed it for a party and it was a big hit. Everybody wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to go with the roller.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps stuff from falling on the dogs etc while they are on the roller. It also protects you walls if a brat sprays out some grease. Well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: sdcdew

customer_reviews.title: When plugged in for the first time rollers did not ...
customer_reviews.text: When plugged in for the first time rollers did not roll. Called 800# and was instructed to send it back as it was probably an issue with the motor. Very frustrating. Waiting for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: renelle bengle

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker all in all
customer_reviews.text: Wish the book would tell you what temp to cook at & how long . Squeaks a little & I did put oil on it first time . Great cooker all in all .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This has been in the breakroom at work for roughly 6 months and it is in use almost every day, 7 days a week. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Seeger

customer_reviews.title: really bad products
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the hotdog grill. It was broke all the gears and assembly parts were all loose inside. It took me a couple of hours to put it back together. I think the seller needs to make sure they send out quality items. I am very leary of buying things from Tommy's discouts
customer_reviews.author: Tazzman

customer_reviews.title: hotdog roller
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves it, he took it to our church and made lunch for everyone. Everyone enjoyed their dog.......it was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Motors so not last to keep dogs rolling
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Motors so not last to keep dogs rolling. Second motor burnt out with very little time!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: bought for party
customer_reviews.text: cooks hot dogs really well, however it is rusting out very quickly. had to have drip pan remade with better quality steel. and in between the drip pan and the bottom must of held moisture after cleaned and it has rust spots all over.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Pipes

customer_reviews.title: Stop Working after 1 year with little use
customer_reviews.text: This hot dog roller stop working after one year of limited use. We only used it probably 10 times. We followed all instructions and kept it clean. We used the proper hot dogs. Now the warranty is up and basically we are out of luck. It was stored backed it the box it arrived in. The rollers not longer work. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Despina

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Worthless unless you simply want to make hot dogs once. Stopped working and ineligible for return. I've never heard of such a thing but I know what my next business venture will be. Manufacturer a complete piece of sh!t sell it and 15 minutes after it arrives and it breaks simply tell my one time customers, oh well got my money. What are you gonna do?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: RonLA

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great Product Great Price and fast shipping. As stated "Commercial Quality" ! Liked it so much I bought another one for our store. Heats fast and keeps hot dogs hot and fresh. Rollers make a squeaking noise once in a while, if you don't want a little noise I suggest you buy a similar one Like a Star Brand for about $900.
customer_reviews.author: RJay

customer_reviews.title: Great Northern Commercial Quality 18 Hot Dog and 7 Roller Grilling Machine,.2nd one I purchased  But !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Northern Commercial Quality 18 Hot Dog and 7 Roller Grilling Machine,.2nd one I purchased But !!!! This one came dented but decided to keep after everything worked ! The product was not packed in another box and the factory carton had no protective formed form on all sides ? But I'm taking into consideration the great price of $115.00 !!! Good deal if you don't mind a dent or to after shipping or warehouse sorting !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dmiller

customer_reviews.title: hot dog roller
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with this product until i used it. Only the 2 back rollers get hot the other3 dont even get warm. I changed the fuse still same results Would love to send it back only one problem did'nt get an invoice with the product when it was shipped.It was deleted off my email so no way to send it back at this time.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hotdog roller! As does everyone else that has been at a party or event where I have used it. It works exactly as it is supposed to, cooking hotdogs at a higher setting on half the rollers and keeping the rest warm on the other half. My unit was slightly bent on arrival due to the lack of packing material in the box, just a cosmetic issue and I really can't complain given the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 4 grandsons when they are hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged machine. No damages . Temperature controls worked very well. Heated quickly and held warm temperature accurately.Very happy with machine.
customer_reviews.author: W Spot

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Before I could put a hot dog on, one of the rollers stopped working and would not spin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of them and it only worked for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them and it only worked for a month
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Using it for concession stand. It really saves a lot of time. Our hot dogs are so big that we can only put 2 rows on it so sometimes the hot spots only hit 1 side but I just flip them around half way through and they work wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Great Northern Popcorn Company 4078 GNP Hotdog 7 Roll Hot Dog Roller Machine, Stainless
product_meta.description:
Style Name:7 roller grill

The Great Northern Popcorn Company has created a masterpiece with their "Top Dawg" Professional Hot Dog Machine. This is not a cheap knock off, it is the original machine and carries the Great Northern Popcorn Companies 1 year limited warranty. Get ready to make plump, juicy, hot dogs without the fizzle factor. Now you can make mouth-watering rotisserie style ballpark hot dogs in your home or business. You will be able to grill your own ball park franks, Dodger Dogs, Philly Franks, or any other of your favorite stadium dogs. For you Green Bay Packer fans, these do wonders on Milwaukee s finest sausages.

With the GNP your customers will not have to wait in long lines for a stale dog since GNP's exclusive slow roller system is guaranteed to keep each dog fresh, plump, and juicy until served. It is perfect for birthday parties, and is a hit at holiday cookouts, Super bowl parties, and just celebrating with family and friends. Need a larger or smaller machine? Check out our "Big Dawg", "Mad Dawg" and "Ultra Dawg" commercial grillers as well.

Quality/Durability:

The GNP griller is used by convenience stores, mini-marts, gas stations, and concession stands across the country. It is made of industrial strength stainless steel and meets the toughest FDA standards for restaurant equipment. Again, this is the original GNP machine and carries the Great Northern Popcorn Company's 1 year limited warranty. Don't settle for 2nd best.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS:

 * Maximum Capacity: 18 Hot Dogs Per Batch (6 Rows of 3)
 * Stainless Steel Design makes it Safe and Easy to Clean
 * 7 Premium Grade Non-Stick Stainless Steel Rollers
 * Heavy Duty Motor and Safety Temperature Control
 * Dual Temperature Controls: You can roast/cook on the front rollers while you keep the batch on the real rollers warm
 * Removable and Easy to Clean Stainless Steel Drip Tray
 * Full roller rotation. Not partial like some of the cheap imitations!
 * Heat Up and Keep Warm Control Modes
 * Easy to use with front ON-OFF switch
 * Skid Proof Rubber Feet for Tabletop Use
 * Built-in Fuse for Safety Purposes
 * Grill Dimension: 23" L x 13" W x 6.5" H
 * Tray size: 17-3/4" L x 11" W
 * Power: 1400 Watts
 * 110V/60Hz
 * Full 1 Year Warranty
 * CE Approved

PACKAGE INCLUDES:

 * (1) Commercial 7 Roller Hot Dog Machine
 * (1) Stainless Steel Drip Tray
 * (1) Instruction Manual
feature_bullets: Slow rolling grill. Perfect for commerical or home use
Kindly refer the user Manual under the product details field for the set up and operational related issued. Kindly refer page number 4 and 5 for more details.
